nodes.text: The MA-9 Frontline Droid was a model of bipedal battle droid available during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. The MA-9 was marketed as being obedient, adaptive, and deadly, and was equipped with a jet charge and a blade built into its bracer, as well as an optional carbonizing spray. The Twi'lek arms dealer Olok the Shadow sold MA-9 Frontline Droids in his auction on Darvannis.

MA-9 Frontline Droids appear as one of the four types of droid enemies in the Olok the Shadow boss encounter in the Operation "Scum and Villainy," which was added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of the Digital Expansion Rise of the Hutt Cartel.
